casebody.data:
2002-0269 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Jeremy MATTIO. No. 2002-K-0269. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Mattio, Jeremy; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. M, .No. 278194; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 KA 0059.

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., would grant the writ.
